==Trivia==
* {{Transclude|A Harmonious Rest|KondaVillageTheme|section=1}}
* ''Hakushin's Lullaby'' was featured in the rhythm game-based event [[Tuned to the World's Sounds]] from [[Version 2.2]]. During the event, the player is paired with the character [[Kamisato Ayaka]] for this song.
